We have multiple PhD and Postdoc openings, including joint supervision with CUHK and SLAI. To apply, please email me your CV and representative publications. NCEL members won 12 Best Paper Awards from leading venues, such as IEEE Transactions on Wireless Communications, E-energy, WiOpt, and SmartGridComm.
